channel.title: Help with compiler
channel.description:
ok well my server us fine massacre.servegame.com i can make admins an all it runs fine other people have joined but when i tried to update the log in button then compile it my compiler comes up with this "The system cannot find the path specified" even tho the server works i cant update can some 1 help me urgently!? i add rep if works..
-Thank you- come visit massacre.servegame.com

item.title: Help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @lilg101 lilg101
item.description:
@lilg101 wrote:

i added code for JDK 10 and it dont come up cannot find path nemore it comes u wif : error: cannot read *java.
1 error
Exeption in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassdefFoundError
press any key to continue… what now??? help plz.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @HeLLnuT HeLLnuT
item.description:
@HeLLnuT wrote:

OR

@echo off title Server Compile color B "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe" server pause

if u downloaded the JDK update 10

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @money67 money67
item.description:
@money67 wrote:

are you using a router?

I am and this is my compile.bat

@echo off title Server Compile color B "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @lilg101 lilg101
item.description:
@lilg101 wrote:

ok i done the varibles an now when i try to run server it comes up with : Error opening registry key software\javaSoft\Java runtime enviroment’
Error :could not find Java.dll
Error : could not find java 2 runtime enviroment.
ok sorted that problem my server works but i still cant compile i dont know the new java varibles i tried adding the basic ones an it still wont work…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @lilg101 lilg101
item.description:
@lilg101 wrote:

[quote=“masterp00n, post:3, topic:44650”][quote author=superbum1 link=topic=61939.msg740584#msg740584 date=1168066712]
uhhh download jdk?
[/quote]if you don’t know what it is don’t reply…ok lilg it means you have to set environable paths…go to tutorial section and find mod taharoks ultimate guide scroll down a little and you will find somethign about setting environble paths[/quote] ok seems god i looked at guide and it explained varibles but not how to sort it out… or how to set them?

Read full topic
